JobFullDesc: NIKE, Inc., Beaverton, OR. Develops, configures, and tests programs, systems and solutions in order to meet defined digital data product specifications and direction. Work with stakeholders including Product, Privacy, Data, Operations and Marketing teams to partner in data-related technical development and build data products that meet the consumer needs and standards as defined. Working at Nike's Global Technology organization; engage in developing and maintaining real-time data products and tools that process millions of consumer data signals and turns them into actionable insights. Design the backend architecture for data ingestion using tools like HBase, Hadoop, Spark Streaming/SQL, Elasticsearch on Amazon AWS for the system to capture data in real-time, as well as batch updates with high read/write throughput. Develop scripts as Infrastructure-As-A-Service using Amazon AWS Cloud services to deploy the backend infrastructure which includes Networks, Datastores, Compute Nodes, Code repos and Metric dashboards. Leverage tools/frameworks like Splunk, New Relic, Slack and PagerDuty for granular and pro-active Operational Observability and monitoring of the application.  Develop domain specific Application Programming Interfaces (known as APIs) using REST/gRPC protocols that will be consumed by various downstream applications and teams. Guide Operations team during application outages or production issues by performing root-cause analysis and pushing any required hot-fixes to production quickly to reduce the business impact for downstream consuming applications. Run performance tests to estimate the data processing throughput limits and perform tuning to bring down response times within SLA.
